CustomField.description: Sales Discretionary Discount, in percent, before Sales approval is required. Combination of Median, Max, and Histical Customer Discount from Discount Recommendation Grid, and minimum Level 1 percentage from the Sales Approval Matrix.
CustomField.formula:
IF( ISNULL(Min_Discount__c), NULL, IF( OR( ISNULL( Discount_Guidance__c), AND( Apttus_Proposal__Proposal__r.Quote_For_Open_Offer_Customer__c, NOT(ISPICKVAL(Apttus_Proposal__Product__r.Open_Offer_Product_Category__c, ""))
) ), Min_Discount__c, IF( OR( ISNULL(Customer_Historical_Discount__c), Customer_Historical_Discount__c > Max_Discount_Guidance__c ), IF( Max_Discount_Guidance__c > Min_Discount__c, Max_Discount_Guidance__c,Min_Discount__c ), IF( Customer_Historical_Discount__c > Median_Discount_Guidance__c, IF( Customer_Historical_Discount__c > Min_Discount__c, Customer_Historical_Discount__c,Min_Discount__c ), IF( Median_Discount_Guidance__c >Min_Discount__c, Median_Discount_Guidance__c,Min_Discount__c ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Sales Discretionary Discount, in percent, before Sales approval is required. Combination of Median, Max, and Histical Customer Discount from Discount Recommendation Grid, and minimum Level 1 percentage from the Sales Approval Matrix. Excludes minimum Level 1 percentage from Sales Approval Matrix
CustomField.label: Sales Approval Threshold
